item.title: Backtracking algorithms: experiment, inspect and adapt
item.description: In this article I tell the story of a beautiful picture which represents an interesting mathematical problem whose algorithmic solution has some analogy to the agile way of solving problems and making progress. The picture My former high school math teacher Hansruedi Widmer (“retired as a teacher, not as a mathematician”) daily posts mathematical puzzles, bits of history or just “fun facts” on X (formerly known as twitter).
